attributes.action: Leave our loved ones graves alone
attributes.additional_details: my nephews grave is at ST Michaels cemetery tilehurst reading Berkshire and now there are notices about items being removed from our loved ones graves eg fences ornaments etc my nephew was still born and was buried there 10years ago and has had all his items on his grave ever since but now apparently my nephews grave and a lot of others are now not meeting their criteria and items will be removed obviously the desceased cannot speak for themselves so were all here to do it for them

rejection.details: The petitioner should contact the incumbent and Parochial Church Council of St Michael's, Tilehurst.  Any appeal against the PCC's/incumbent's decisions would need to be addressed to the Diocese of Oxford.
